message: I propose dividing the money 7000 for me and 3000 for you. Remember, with each round, the value of money decreases.
I'll give you a smaller share this time, but I think this is a fair split considering the decreasing value of money.
Considering the inflation, I've adjusted my offer to a 6000$ split for me and 4000$ for you. I believe this is a fair compromise given the diminishing value of money.
